thread.title: Report: Florida, Miami nearing deal to renew football rivalry
thread.title_full: Report: Florida, Miami nearing deal to renew football rivalry

author: Dustin Tackett
title: Report: Florida, Miami nearing deal to renew football rivalry
text:
Report: Florida, Miami nearing deal to renew football rivalry College Spun 4 hrs ago Dustin Tackett © Kim Klement-USA TODAY Sports Florida Gators mascot Albert does the gator chomp with fans. The Florida Gators and Miami Hurricanes are nearing a deal to kick off the 2019 college football season inside Orlando’s Citrus Bowl, according to the Orlando Sentinel’s Mike Bianci .
AdChoices These two teams, which haven’t played since 2013, once made up a thriving rivalry, until Florida dropped Miami from its schedule in 1987. But according to Bianci, it’s just a matter of time before this deal is finalized .
The Hurricanes have won seven of the last eight games and lead the all-times series 29-26.
